Package cycleguard.database.packs

Class PackDataService

java.lang.Object
cycleguard.database.packs.PackDataService
All Implemented Interfaces:
RideProcessable
@Service public class PackDataService extends Object implements RideProcessable
Service wrapper for retrieving and modifying PackData.

  • Method Details

    • getPack

      public PackData getPack(String packName)
      Retrieves a pack from its pack name.
      Parameters:
      packName - Name of pack to retrieve
      Returns:
      PackData, null if doesn't exist

    • packExists

      public boolean packExists(String packName)
      Return if or not a pack exists.
      Parameters:
      packName - Name of pack
      Returns:
      If the pack exists

    • createPack

      public int createPack(String username, String packName, String password)
      Create a new pack. Returns an HTTP status code, regarding status.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of pack creator
      packName - Name of pack
      password - Password of pack, to enter the pack
      Returns:
      200 on success
      400 on malformed pack name
      409 on conflict with another pack name, or if user already in another pack

    • joinPack

      public int joinPack(String username, String packName, String password)
      Join a pack. Updates pack and profile information.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of joinee
      packName - Name of pack
      password - Password of pack, to enter the pack
      Returns:
      200 on success, or already in pack
      400 on malformed pack name
      401 on password mismatch
      404 if pack not existent
      409 if user already in another pack

    • leavePack

      public int leavePack(String username)
      Leave a pack as a non-owner pack member.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of leaving user
      Returns:
      200 on success, or already not in pack
      400 on malformed pack name
      404 if pack not existent
      409 if user is pack owner

    • leavePackAsOwner

      public int leavePackAsOwner(String username, String newOwner)
      Leave a pack as the owner of the pack.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of leaving owner
      newOwner - Username of new owner
      Returns:
      200 on success, or already not in pack
      400 on malformed pack name
      404 if pack not existent
      409 if user is pack owner

    • processNewRide

      public void processNewRide(String username, ProcessRideService.RideInfo rideInfo, Instant now)
      Description copied from interface: RideProcessable
      Process the information from a new ride.
      Specified by:
      processNewRide in interface RideProcessable
      Parameters:
      username - User who completed ride
      rideInfo - Stats of completed ride
      now - Seconds since epoch when ride was completed

    • setGoal

      public int setGoal(String username, long durationSeconds, String goalField, long goalAmount)
      Set the current pack goal.
      Parameters:
      username - User performing action
      durationSeconds - Duration of new pack goal
      goalField - Distance or time
      goalAmount - Total amount to complete goal
      Returns:
      200 on success
      400 on malformed request
      401 if user is not pack owner
      404 if pack not existent

    • cancelCurrentGoal

      public int cancelCurrentGoal(String username)
      Cancels the current pack goal.
      Parameters:
      username - User performing action
      Returns:
      200 on success
      401 if user is not pack owner
      404 if pack not existent

    • inviteUser

      public int inviteUser(String username, String userToInvite)
      Invites a user to the pack.
      Parameters:
      username - User performing action
      userToInvite - User being invited
      Returns:
      200 on success or if already invited
      404 if users not existent

    • acceptInvite

      public int acceptInvite(String username, String packName)
      Joins the pack as an invited user.
      Parameters:
      username - User accepting invite
      packName - Pack to join
      Returns:
      200 on success, or already in pack
      400 on malformed pack name
      401 on password mismatch
      404 if pack not existent
      409 if user already in another pack

    • cancelInvite

      public int cancelInvite(String username, String otherUser)
      Cancels a current pack invitation.
      Parameters:
      username - User performing action
      otherUser - User with invitation
      Returns:
      200 on success or already cancelled
      404 if pack not existent

    • declineInvite

      public int declineInvite(String username, String packName)
      Declines a current pack invitation.
      Parameters:
      username - User performing action
      packName - Pack invitation to decline
      Returns:
      200 on success or if already declined
      404 if pack not existent

    • changeOwner

      public int changeOwner(String username, String newOwner)
      Changes the pack's owner.
      Parameters:
      username - Owner performing action
      newOwner - New owner
      Returns:
      200 on success
      401 if user is not the current owner 404 if pack not existent 409 if username equals new owner, or new owner not in members list

    • kickUser

      public int kickUser(String username, String user)
      Removes a user from the pack.
      Parameters:
      username - Owner performing action
      user - User to kick
      Returns:
      200 on success, or if user already kicked
      401 if user is not the current owner 404 if pack not existent 409 if username equals user to kick, or user not in pack
